anathema: Consort or trade with non-Mwangi peoples, defy Walkena’s orders
edict: Uphold Mzali’s laws, tend to Walkena and obey his instructions, oppose exploitation of the Mwangi Expanse
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Walkena (The God-King)](/Deities.aspx?ID=683)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 18

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Mwangi Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=20)

**Edicts** Uphold Mzali’s laws, tend to Walkena and obey his instructions, oppose exploitation of the Mwangi Expanse

**Anathema** Consort or trade with non-Mwangi peoples, defy Walkena’s orders

**Area of Concern**
Mzali, nationalism, reverence

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38)

**Favored Weapon** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=365)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Freedom](/Domains.aspx?ID=77), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=92), [Tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=96)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=76)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Breathe Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=1457)

- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=1530)

- **4th**
[Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=1748)

</column>
name: Walkena (The God-King)
